thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com
thread.title: Darrel

author: Darrel
title: Darrel
text: I ordered 2 heavy duty 650 # capacity wheels to support the engine end of a portable welder. The wheels fit properly and are exactly what I wanted. I was having problems finding wheels of the proper size with an axle diameter of three-quarters of an inch. The website offers plenty of options. I will be a repeat customer. The processing of the of the order was prompt as was the shipping. Fed Ex delivered my wheels and I was able to track the shipment.
